review: I wanted a media player that satisfied most of my requirements that afforded me easy access to my Prime account at a reasonable price. This fits the bill.
author: Bruce O.

review: Works very well for Netflix, but all Amazon content including Prime is limited to the US, which is a very big disappointment. The device is compact, though still very thick, which can be awkward to connect directly to your TV if you are using your other HDMI inputs. Fortunately it comes with an extension cord that solves that. The remote is also very sleek and useful.
author: Jorge Villalobos "Metal fan"

review: Love the Firestick!  As a member of Amazon Prime we are able to view lots of prime movies and tv shows along with Netflix.  Were able to pretty much plug it in and voila!  Entertainment  on our big tv!  Well worth the money!!

review: Great little device!  Outstanding usability with the simple pushbutton remote and excellent video and audio quality.  I bought this to use with my older, pre-smart, Samsung LCD due to the apparent abandonment of support for the Yahoo widget funtionality.  Now I get everything I had before and more.  Great value, I am very pleased with this device.
